article_text: Dear Abby: I am dating a man, “Richard,” who is significantly older — 17 years, actually. I’m in my mid-20s. I have no problem with it, as I have always been attracted to men who are older and have their lives together.

article_metadata.title: Dear Abby: Couple’s age gap poses challenges to be overcome | Miami Herald

article_summary:
Dear Abby: I am dating a man, “Richard,” who is significantly older — 17 years, actually.
I have no problem with it, as I have always been attracted to men who are older and have their lives together.
I’m in my mid-20s.
